metadata.title: CVE-2020-14033 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in janus-gateway (aka Janus WebRTC Server) through0.10.0. janus_streaming_rtsp_parse_sdp in plugins/janus_streaming.c has aBuffer Overflow via a crafted RTSP server.

criterions.comment: janus: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
